name: Tagging
friendlyName: Tag Releases, Pipelines and Git Commits (incl. cascading back).
description: Tag your pipelines, releases and git commits.
author: Foxhole

inputs.name: tagtype
inputs.label: Running for

options.release: Release (Tags Release and optional builds and git)

inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the where you want to run the tagging.

inputs.name: tags
inputs.label: Tag(s) to be added
inputs.helpMarkDown: Seperate tags with a ','. For Git only the first tag is taken.

inputs.name: tagbuildartifacts
inputs.label: Tag Build Artifacts
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if you want to tag the build artifacs for this release.

inputs.name: tagBuildGitRepository
inputs.label: Tag the Git Commit for the build Artifacts
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if you want to add a git annotated tag for the build artifacts.

inputs.name: taggitartifacts
inputs.label: Tag Git Artifacts
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if you want to tag the git artifacs for this release.

inputs.name: tagbuildartifactsexclusions
inputs.label: Build Artifacts exclusions (RegEx)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Exclude build artifacts from being tagged. Use RegEx as input.

inputs.name: taggitartifactsexclusions
inputs.label: Git Artifacts exclusions (RegEx)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Exclude git artifacts from being tagged. Use RegEx as input.
